Create staff member accounts to help you perform the administrative tasks more conveniently. Staff members you create can separately login to manage the things and perform the administrative actions that the admin account allowed them to perform.

MumaraSMS+ covers every important aspect that you may need to run text messaging platform successfully, including the billing operations. It offers integration with comprehensive billing system that would automate the billing and invoicing part of your SMS platform.

MumaraSMS+ offers bunch of tools to help you well-tune your text messaging platform and flawlessly manage the operations. Tools that can help you take required security measures, keep the list of global mobile carriers updated and add multiple languages.
Welcome to Mumara App Store, it started after the immense success of the Self-Hosted edition of Mumara Email, largely accepted worldwide.
Build your Text Messaging Platform using MumaraSMS+
SMS Marketing and Text Engagement Campaigns with Global Coverage

Offer your clients a way to validate numbers saved against the contacts within the list. Enable system by selecting the preferred validation service between the available. It eventually helps you and your clients to keep the message failure rate as low as insignificant.

MumaraSMS+ brings wide-ranging integrated features at your disposal to facilitate setting up a text messaging platform, a platform with all functional capabilities to run SMS marketing service without having to code anything or deploy any hardware. It is just matter of few selections, simple configuration and settings, and you are good to start selling your SMS packages.
The Best Decision You can make to Enhance Your Reach

Fuel your multi-channel marketing and customer communication strategy with text messaging. Create engaging text campaigns and get your text read within seconds of delivery. Reach right on your customer’s mobile with important billing reminders, service notifications and alert messages.

Setup geographically distributed zones to define custom sending preferences for each zone. Prioritize sending among the available gateways, and position gateway according the sending priority, i.e. preferred gateway on the top followed by the second and 3rd priority.

An integrated client management function that lets you perform variety of tasks with regard to create client groups, add client accounts, view and manage all of the existing accounts with ability to send them a broadcast. Collection of all functions to help you manage the client accounts.

With MumaraSMS+ you don’t need investing time and effort to arrange required components, just focus on growing your clients while we take care of the rest. Your clients on board are empowered with client platform loaded with all required features to send and scale text messaging.

You are being provided with more than a few options to create a pricing plan that best suits your target audience/ clients. The structure is flexible enough to create and offer your client a monthly subscription packages, purchase credit plans or topup options.

Get your system to work with multiple gateways to deliver the text messages of your clients. MumaraSMS+ offers a platform integrated with globally acknowledged SMS gateways including, Twilio, Clickatell and Infobip.

Configure, control and manage everything from an easy to use control panel. Create packages, configure gateway APIs, manage client accounts, monitor sending and more, with an extensive list of settings & parental controls for every feature to function according to your set preferences.
